  • Time Machine
  • View page source

Time Machine

backup_on_battery

Customizes Time Machine backup behavior while on battery.

Note

You might need to reboot after applying. Mind that setting this needs Full Disk Access on your terminal emulator application.

Values:

  • bool [default: false]

offer_new_disks

Customizes Time Machine behavior when connecting an unknown disk.

Note

You might need to reboot after applying. Mind that setting this needs Full Disk Access on your terminal emulator application.

Values:

  • bool [default: true]
